<h3 id="X18570">X(18570) = MIDPOINT OF X(3) AND X(378)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2[a^8 - 2a^6(b^2 + c^2) + 4a^4b^2c^2 + a^2(b^2 + c^2)(2b^4 - 3b^2c^2 + 2c^4) - (b^2 - c^2)^2(b^4 + 3b^2c^2 + c^4)] : :
<b><br>
X(18570) = 3*R^2*X(2) - (9*R^2-2*SW)*X(3)<br>
3 X[2] + X[35481], 3 X[3] - X[22], 5 X[3] - 2 X[7555], 7 X[3] - X[12082], 5 X[3] - X[12083], 9 X[3] - X[44457], 5 X[3] - 3 X[44837], X[22] + 3 X[378], 2 X[22] - 3 X[7502], 5 X[22] - 6 X[7555], 7 X[22] - 3 X[12082], 5 X[22] - 3 X[12083], 3 X[22] - X[44457], 5 X[22] - 9 X[44837], 3 X[376] + X[7391], 2 X[378] + X[7502], 5 X[378] + 2 X[7555], 7 X[378] + X[12082], 5 X[378] + X[12083], 9 X[378] + X[44457], 5 X[378] + 3 X[44837], 3 X[381] - 4 X[13413], 3 X[381] - 5 X[31236], 3 X[381] - X[35480], X[427] - 3 X[44218], X[427] + 3 X[44285], 2 X[427] - 3 X[44287], 3 X[549] - 2 X[6676], 5 X[631] - X[44440], and many more
</b>
<p>
Let A'<sub>1</sub>B'<sub>1</sub>C'<sub>1</sub>, A'<sub>2</sub>B'<sub>2</sub>C'<sub>2</sub> be the 1st and 2nd Ehrmann inscribed triangles, and V<sub>A</sub>V<sub>B</sub>V<sub>C</sub> the Ehrmann vertex-triangle.  X(18570) is the radical center of the circumcircles of A'<sub>1</sub>B'<sub>1</sub>C'<sub>1</sub>, A'<sub>2</sub>B'<sub>2</sub>C'<sub>2</sub>, and V<sub>A</sub>V<sub>B</sub>V<sub>C</sub>.
</p>
<p>
X(18570) lies on these lines: {2, 3}, {36, 37729}, {49, 12111}, {51, 32110}, {54, 11440}, {74, 5012}, {99, 14558}, {110, 18435}, {143, 11424}, {154, 11472}, {156, 12162}, {182, 2781}, {184, 5663}, </p>
<p>
X(18570) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 378}, {20, 31723}, {427, 44249}, {3534, 31133}, {44218, 44285}<br>
X(18570) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 39504}, {427, 44236}, {7502, 3}, {12083, 7555}, {15760, 140}, {19127, 5092}, {25337, 3530}, {37969, 18571}, {44210, 12100}, {44239, 548}, {44259, 43615}, {44261, 34200}, {44262, 549}, {44263, 5}, {44271, 45179}, {44287, 44218}, {44288, 427}<br>
X(18570) = orthocentroidal circle inverse of X(10254)<br>
X(18570) = anticomplement of X(46029)<br>
X(18570) = X(55)-of-Trinh-triangle if ABC is acute<br>
X(18570) = harmonic center of nine-point circle and Trinh circle<br>
X(18570) = Trinh-isogonal conjugate of X(3098)<br>
X(18570) = center of circle that is the circumperp conjugate of the de Longchamps line<br>
X(18570) = circumperp conjugate of X(7574)<br>
X(18570) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {2, 4, 10254}, {2, 35473, 3}, {3, 4, 1658}, {3, 5, 37814}, {3, 20, 7525}, {3, 24, 15331}, {3, 25, 18324}, {3, 381, 186}, {3, 382,
